header.title: About
header.description:
Mazari Autonomous Robotics Systems (MARS Robotics®) specializes in UAV solutions, offering flight control systems, GPS/INS navigation, mission planning, and testing. Focused on low-speed, short-range UAVs and UGVs, MARS Robotics® provides ITAR-free products.

They offer turnkey solutions, OEM support, and technical assistance for autonomous systems design, integration, and adaptation. Their MARSFly system cuts autopilot costs by 50-60%. MARS Robotics® also designs and develops MALE UAV systems, providing comprehensive design, development, and flight control integration per customer needs.

ourMission.title: Mission
ourMission.descriptionTitle: MARSRobotics® is divided into two main divisions:
ourMission.description:
MARSRobotics® Engineering with its mission: enables UAS OEMs to rapidly develop, price competitive, differentiated low cost and ITAR free systems solutions and services, while creating and maintaining their own intellectual property.

MARSRobotics® Remote Sensing with its mission: empowers our customers in implementing state of the art remote sensing solutions, High Accuracy workflows for construction inspection, surveying, aerial mapping, mining and public safety.

ourVision.title: Vision
ourVision.description: To be customers first-choice in providing World-Class UAS services and innovative products while leading Guidance and Control technologies to support UAS OEMs solutions in the region.

ourApproach.title: Approach
ourApproach.description: At MARSRobotics®, our approach is rooted in innovation and collaboration. We emphasize agile development cycles, tight integration between hardware and software teams, and a strong focus on customer-specific solutions that reduce cost and maximize efficiency.

ceoSection.title: The People are the actual investment.

letsWorkTogether.title: Let's Work Together
letsWorkTogether.description: Ready to take the next step? Contact us today to discuss your needs and explore how our expertise can drive your success.
